replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
ghghgd 发表于 2020-2-9 16:49
是这个吧@ECHO OFF

:start
那就卸载你现在安装的 java

安装我这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... 33b84d0e960903adac8

replies.txt_content:
ghghgd 发表于 2020-2-9 16:46
是不是这个啊#Minecraft server properties

generator-settings=

goto start
